Math

We took a break from math today! We will start topic 4 on Monday!

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night atÂ https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9EÂ to help strengthen their skills.

Language Arts

Complete pages 46-47 in the Grammar Workshop book

Journal Writing â€“ Chuseok Plans

This weekend, I would like you to write a journal about what you are going to do during Chuseok, the Korean Thanksgiving.
Please remember:
Use the future tense with â€œgoing to / will"
Organize your writing with an introduction, body, and conclusion
Use sequence words (First, Next, After that, Finally)
Write in full sentences

Here is my example journal:

This Chuseok, I will spend time with my family and enjoy the long holiday. It is going to be a very special time.

First, I am going to hang out with my kids at the Han River. We are going to ride bikes, play games, and enjoy the fresh air together. After that, we are going to visit my parents-in-law. We are going to eat a delicious family dinner, and it is going to be a good way to show respect to my family.

Since it is a long vacation, I am also going to take my kids to the Palaces in Seoul because they are free during Chuseok. We are going to walk around, take pictures, and learn more about Korean history. At home, we are going to rest, watch movies, and enjoy some relaxing family time.

I am sure this Chuseok is going to be wonderful. I am going to make many happy memories with my family.

KoreanÂ 

Pages 115-119 and 20-33 in the Korean textbook and activity book.

Chinese

You need to write the words' student/boy/girl' twice before the next class.

Social Studies
